1: God is standing in the assembly of God. In the midst of the gods[a] he renders judgment.
2: How long will you judge unjustly and show favoritism to the wicked? Interlude
3: Judge in favor of the weak and the fatherless. Acquit the oppressed and the poor.
4: Rescue the weak and the needy. Deliver them from the hand of the wicked.
5: They do not know. They do not understand. They walk around in darkness. All the foundations of the earth are shaken.
6: I myself said, “You are 'gods,' and you are all 'sons of the Most High.'
7: But you will die like men. You will fall like any other ruler.”
8: Rise up, O God. Judge the earth, for you will take possession of all the nations.
